Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2017 08:38PM Lmm83 wrote: Im 34, had my first mammogram which immediately led to an ultra sound and then a biopsy of breast and lymph. Results show a 2.1cm irregular mass with lobulated margin, mass is hypoehoic and vascularity present. Axillary lymph with cortical thickness of 6mm. BIRADS 4 My head is spinning I'm not sure what to think at this point. The only person who has said anything was the radiologist that said I'm just going to say "this doesn't look good" I'm waiting for the bIopsy results. I have no idea what to expect
Posts.Title: Beginning the road to frustration, I fear karmicways marie5890
